Pills, medicines and other 
drugs
Some medicines, including 
some common painkillers, can 
harm your baby’s health, for 
example medication to treat 
long-term conditions such 
as asthma, thyroid disease, 
diabetes and epilepsy. To be 
on the safe side, you should:
• Keep taking your 
medication until you 
check with your doctor.
